channel.title: Projects on Hugo Profile
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hugo Profile

item.title: ChessBot - Closed Loop Control
item.description: This system uses closed-loop velocity control and vision-based feedback to control a robotic arm designed for playing chess. The parallel linkage mechanism ensures accurate and fluid movement of the chess pieces on a real board.

item.title: Drone Beach Safety System - Capstone Project
item.description: This system uses computer vision and multi-agent control algorithms to detect hazards such as rip currents, sharks, and swimmers in distress.
